modName: A Trolling Troll with Trololol Song
summary: Trolling can\'t get much worse than this.
descriptionHtml:
Do you hate trolls as much as I do? 

Install: Extract .rar contents to your Skyrim Data/ folder. Launch game, select DATA FILES and choose to Load Loose.

Uninstall: Just delete them!

New update 1.3 as of 7:40PM EST - Sounds were the wrong bit-rate. All good now.

Oh...video in thread too.
author: Tytanis
